channel.title: Sports News Feed222
channel.description: 22222Stay updated with the latest sports news.

item.title: Olympic Gold Medalist Retires222
item.description: 22222A legendary athlete announces retirement after a decorated career.

item.title: 2222Surprise Comeback in Soccer Match222
item.description: 22222Down by two goals, a team stages a remarkable comeback to win the match.

item.title: 2222Boxing Champion Defends Title
item.description: 2222The reigning boxing champion successfully defends their title in a grueling bout.

item.title: 2222222Young Swimmer Breaks National Record
item.description: 22222A talented young swimmer sets a new national record in the pool.
